content: or public side of work est established sl slip as in slip the next stitch from left to k knit right purl-wise ktbl knit through back loop ssk slip one stitch as if to knit slip the next k2tog knit two stitches together as one stitch as if to knit insert left needle into front stitch of these two stitches and knit them together n needle s slip m marker st stitch p purl tbl through back loop ws wrong or non-public side of work start sock cuff co 60 72 sts join to knit in the round being careful to not twist sts round 1 p1 *k4 p2 repeat from * to last 5 sts k4 p1 work round 1 a total of 6 times leg one round 1 work row 1 of chart a in appropriate size back of leg then work row 1 of chart b in appropriate size front of leg next round work next row of chart a in appropriate size then work next row of chart b in appropriate size cont in pattern for a total of 30 36 rnds next round work row 1 of chart b in appropriate size then work row 1 of chart a in appropriate size next round work next row of chart b in appropriate size then work next row of chart a in appropriate size cont in pattern for a total of 34 40 rnds 64 76 rnds total proceed to heel flap one © 2010 star athena - all rights reserved 2 http //keeponknittinginthefreeworld blogspot com/ leg two round 1 work row 1 of chart b in appropriate size back of leg then work row 1 of chart a in appropriate size front of leg next round work next row of chart b in appropriate size then work next row of chart a in appropriate size cont in patt working entire charts for a total of 30 36 rnds next round work row 1 of chart a in appropriate size then work row 1 of chart b in appropriate size next round work next row of chart a in appropriate size then work next row of chart b in appropriate size cont in patt for a total of 35 41 rnds 65 77 rnds total proceed to heel flap two heel flap you will work the heel flap back and forth over 30 36 sts leave the remaining instep 30 36 sts as they are on the needles for now you will not use then while working the heel flap note that you are slipping the first st of every row consider this your first st in the chart heel flap one row 1 rs sl1 counts as first st work row 6 of chart a in appropriate size row 2 ws sl1 counts as first st work next row of chart a in appropriate size cont in est patt for a total of 30 36 row proceed to turn heel heel flap two row 1
